titles.title: God Be With You (easy hymn of the Church)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Till we meet till we meet Till we meet at Jesus' feet Till we meet till we meet God be with you till we meet again{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God be with you till we meet again By His counsels guide uphold you With His sheep securely fold you God be with you till we meet again{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God be with you till we meet again 'Neath His wings securely hide you Daily manna still provide you God be with you till we meet again{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God be with you till we meet again When life's perils thick confound you Put His arms unfailing 'round you God be with you till we meet again{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God be with you till we meet again Keep love;s banner floating o'er you Smite death's threatening wave before you God be with you till we meet again{/lang-eng}
